'''Tetsunosuke''' is an event-exclusive NPC that appears in the [[Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival]] event. He is a [[bake-danuki]] who hangs around with [[Ginkaku]] and [[Kinkaku]]; he seems to be their de facto leader.

==Profile==
<!-- Detailed story/lore information goes here. -->
''(To be added.)''

===Appearance===
Tetsunosuke is a dark gray tanuki with light gray markings. He has a yellow leaf on his head and a red bag tied around his neck.
